Q_DESC: Task to write a c++ program to copy the given string using c-string
TESTCASE_1:
cat drinking milk
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Enter string s1: s1 = cat drinking milk
s2 = cat drinking milk
TESTCASE_2:
dog barking
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Enter string s1: s1 = dog barking
s2 = dog barking
TESTCASE_3:
places are neat
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Enter string s1: s1 = places are neat
s2 = places are neat
